text: Lady Sings the Blues is a 1972 biographical drama movie about jazz singer Billie Holiday and was directed by Sidney J. Furie and stars Diana Ross, Richard Pryor and Billy Dee Williams. It was nominated for 5 Oscars and won for 1 Golden Globe Award in 1973. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney J. title: Lady Sings the Blues (movie)
